statements: SELECT * FROM user_permissions;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions ORDER BY permission_level ASC;
SELECT user_id, access_control FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level > 2;
SELECT user_id, permission_level, access_control FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level = 1;
SELECT user_id, permission_level, access_control FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT access_control, user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level > 3 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE access_control LIKE '%admin%' ORDER BY access_control ASC, permission_level DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT access_control FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY access_control;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level >= 3 AND access_control IS NOT NULL ORDER BY user_id ASC, permission_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level > 1;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions ORDER BY permission_level DESC;
SELECT operation_id, operation_name FROM trading_operations WHERE operation_type = 'BUY';
SELECT operation_id, operation_name, user_id FROM trading_operations ORDER BY operation_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level = 5;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 'f05fccc4-4836-4fd7-aa9e-c594ec1b7d6d';
SELECT operation_id, operation_name FROM trading_operations WHERE operation_type = 'buy' ORDER BY operation_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions JOIN trading_operations ON user_permissions.user_id = trading_operations.user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(operation_id) AS total_operations FROM trading_operations GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_operations > 3;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT description, permission_name FROM permissions;
SELECT user_id, operation_type, executed_at FROM trade_operations WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY executed_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT permission_id, permission_name FROM permissions WHERE permission_name LIKE 'read%';
SELECT * FROM trade_operations ORDER BY operation_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(operation_id) AS total_operations FROM trade_operations GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_operations DESC;
SELECT u.username, p.description FROM users u JOIN permissions p ON u.role = p.permission_name;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT * FROM roles;
SELECT role_id, description FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email = 'admin@example.com';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'a%' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT roles.role_name, permissions.permission_name FROM roles JOIN permissions ON roles.role_id = permissions.permission_id;
SELECT users.username, roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT email, username FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, email, username FROM users ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT permission_name FROM permissions WHERE permission_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = 'user1@example.com';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'admin%';
SELECT role_name, permission_name FROM roles JOIN role_permissions ON roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id JOIN permissions ON role_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 1);
SELECT DISTINCT email FROM users WHERE username = 'john.doe';
